# restoreGState()

**Instance Method**

Sets the current graphics state to the state most recently saved.

## Declaration

```swift
func restoreGState()
```

## Discussion

Core Graphics removes the graphics state at the top of the stack so that the most recently saved state becomes the current graphics state.

## Saving and Restoring Graphics State

- **saveGState()**: Pushes a copy of the current graphics state onto the graphics state stack for the context.

items.description: Pushes a copy of the current graphics state onto the graphics state stack for the context.
